channel.title: Cant find mongodb in data sources
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
I am using google chrome and after signing into my self hosted redish instance. I cannot find mongodb in data sources.
### Technical details:
* Redash Version:8.0.0 * Browser/OS:chrome for max * How did you install Redash:docker image

item.title: Cant find mongodb in data sources
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Do you see any data sources available?

Read full topic
